ingredients.content: 1 oz olive oil, plus extra to cook pasta
450 g dried penne pasta or other short dried pasta

preparations.content: Place water, 1 tsp salt and a splash of olive oil into mixing bowl and cook <b>10 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>.
Add pasta and cook with simmering basket in place of measuring cup, <b>for time indicated on package/100°C//speed 1<b>. Strain pasta through Varoma dish and set aside.
Place olive oil, onions, parsley and ½ tsp salt into mixing bowl and chop <b>5 sec/speed 5<b>. Sauté <b>7 min/Varoma/speed 1<b>. Place dressing in a large serving bowl with reserved pasta.
Place undrained tuna in serving bowl with pasta and dressing and mix together with spatula. Serve immediately.
